room_title: Escape room "Lou's Garage" by Locked 460 Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
room_description: A client you can’t refuse has asked you to find the where-a-bouts of their favorite nephew. He was last seen working Lou’s Garage known to deal in bent cars. You & your crew stop in for a “friendly” chat with Lou but he quickly weasels his way under the garage door and locks you in. That slimy Lou has you behind the 8-ball. You’ve got to find out what has become of that nephew and hop this joint before Lou returns with a button man and bumps you off.
